text: What Happened in the Tunnel is a 1903 American silent movie directed by Edwin S. PorterWhat Happened in the TunnelTracy Fitzpatrick. Art and the Subway: New York Underground and stars Bertha Regustus and Gilbert M. Anderson. ==Actors== * Bertha Regustus – The black maid * Gilbert M. Anderson – The white man ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1903 movies Category:American silent movies
title: What Happened in the Tunnel
